revised_title: Investigating the Properties of Dielectrics and Residual Discharge
tldr: The author investigates the properties of dielectrics and the residual discharge phenomenon, finding that the charge escaping from the specimen is directly proportional to the area of the conducting surface and inversely proportional to the thickness of the specimen. The author also discovers that the specific inductive capacity and the specific inductive residual of a dielectric vary continuously with the time of charging.
